entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text: @TMobile @Tesla I'm a front line worker. It'd be nice to take a break from being gowned up in PPE and go in a road trip after working 60-72 hours per week. I'd start by traveling to hard hit areas of covid-19 and find out what works for protection and what doesn't. Learn and pass on this info.
